statements: DELETE FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE robot_id = 1 AND calibration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM robot_calibration_data WHERE calibration_value > 100.0 AND adjustment_description LIKE '%faulty%';
DELETE FROM Robot_Calibration_Data WHERE robot_id = 1 AND calibration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Robot_Adjustments WHERE adjustment_date >= '2023-01-01' AND robot_id = 2;
DELETE FROM robot_adjustments WHERE robot_id = 5 AND adjustment_date < '2021-05-15';
DELETE FROM robot_list WHERE year_acquired < 2015 AND manufacturer = 'ABB';
DELETE FROM RobotAdjustments WHERE adjustment_id = 100 AND robot_id = 2;
DELETE FROM calibration_logs WHERE success = FALSE;
